Reviews.Title: Useless! Does not detect hidden cameras at all! :-(
Reviews.Author: Nanda Dyssou "Nanda Dyssou"
Reviews.Content: I bought this mini camera detector to scan my apartment, because I had a suspicion that someone (apartment manager or maintenance guy - both are a little more nosy than normal) may have done something stupid... So I wanted to make sure none of the smoke detectors, plugs, etc had any funny business going on. I scanned the whole place, after darkening the room according to instructions, and everything was "clear." What a relief, right? Not so fast!Just to test and make sure it was working, I put my camera on a shelf, set it to record and scanned over it. The Detector showed NOTHING! I tried my cell phone too, set it to recording, held the Detector right next to it, scanned, nothing... This prodcut is basically useless and an utter waste of money. I'm pretty disappointed. :-(

Reviews.Title: Don't Waste Your Money
Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: About the only thing it would detect is my wifi home network. Tried several different cameras and it would not detect anything. Would not recommended.

Reviews.Title: Hard to use this to find a hidden camera
Reviews.Author: Barrett Wainscott
Reviews.Content: This is really difficult to use unless you already know where the camera is.  Yes when we point it toward a known camera you can identify it.  But on several tests with different people they first looked at known cameras to see what they were looking for.  After that they tried to find a hidden camera in the room and all failed.

Reviews.Title: Worked for Us- Mini Camera Detector Brick House
Reviews.Author: Patricia Bell Erickson
Reviews.Content: My daughter is a nanny, and she wanted to know where the Nanny Cam was located in the apartment where she works. Be sure to use the camera detector in as dark a room as possible. It's just easier to see the reflected red light. The detector is very small, fits in a bag, and can be used quickly. I thought it's was a good investment if you are concerned about cameras.
